testcase.name: Match filters test: Matched variable binding to inappropriate values.
testcase.description: Tests what happens when match filters' matched variable is not bound to exactly one fact.

variation.name: Matched variable is bound to fallback value
variation.description: The matched variable is bound to a fallback value, so the filter matches no facts.

variation.name: Matched variable is a general variable
variation.description: The matched variable is a general variable, so the filter matches no facts.

variation.name: Matched variable is a parameter
variation.description: The matched variable is a parameter, so the filter matches no facts.

variation.name: Matched variable is bound to sequence with consistent value for matched aspect
variation.description: The matched variable is bound to a sequence, but it has consistent a value for the matched aspect, so this value is matched to by the filter.

variation.name: Matched variable is bound to sequence with inconsistent values for matched aspect
variation.description: The matched variable is bound to a sequence, and it has inconsistent values for the matched aspect, so an error is raised.
